activities.name: Jump Around
activities.instructions: Jump up and down like a kangaroo! Count each jump out loud. Can you get to 20? Try big jumps and tiny jumps!

activities.name: Dance Party
activities.instructions: Turn on your favorite song in your head and dance! Shake your arms, wiggle your hips, and spin around. You are the best dancer ever!

activities.name: Stretch It Out
activities.instructions: Reach your hands up high to the sky! Now bend down and touch your toes. Reach side to side like a tree in the wind. Do it 5 times!

activities.name: Freeze Dance
activities.instructions: Dance as fast as you can, then FREEZE like a statue! Hold still for 5 seconds. Now dance again! Do it 5 times. No wobbling when you freeze!

activities.name: Animal Walk
activities.instructions: Walk around the room like different animals! First, stomp like an elephant. Then hop like a frog. Now slither like a snake. What animal are you next?

activities.name: Balloon Pop
activities.instructions: Pretend you are blowing up a big balloon. Take a deep breath in and stretch your arms wide. Then POP! Clap your hands and jump! Do it 5 times!

activities.name: Super Hero
activities.instructions: Stand tall with your hands on your hips like a super hero! Now fly around the room with your arms out. Do 5 super hero poses. You are SO strong!

activities.name: Ninja Moves
activities.instructions: Move like a quiet ninja! Tiptoe across the room. Do a slow-motion kick. Try a ninja spin. Can you balance on one foot for 10 seconds? You are a ninja master!
